name: Water Sort - Color Sort
description:
Water Sort Puzzle is a fun and addictive game, try to sort the colored water in the glasses until all colors in the same glass.
Each glass will have different color water, let's exercise your brain: classify the water and then pour water into glass to complete your game.

HOW TO PLAY:
- Tap any glass to pour water to another glass.
- You can only pour the water to another glass if they are same color and there are enough space on the glass.
- Try not to get stuck - but don't worry, you can always go back 5 times or restart the level at any time.

FEATURES:
- Control with one finger.
- Many unique levels
- FREE & EASY TO PLAY.
- NO penalty & time limit
- You can enjoy Water Sort Puzzle
- Pour Water
- Water Sort Free at your own pace!
- Test Your IQ
- Collect Themes
- Resolve The Puzzle

A challenging but relaxing game is free to download, thank you for playing our game.
